name: part_011
file: tmp_【#ノエル生誕はっぴーLIVE】今日は誕生日！！好きなことしてはっぴーになろおおお✨【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [E1HXg-kjOI8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Subaru and Noel are talking on stage. Subaru is praising Noel's performance.
Noel is thanking Subaru and the audience.
Subaru mentions her heart rate is high after dancing.
Subaru wishes Noel a happy birthday and expresses her friendship.
They decide to take photos on stage together, doing various poses.
They wrap up the collaborative part of the stream and move to the next segment.
Noel is alone on stage, expressing her excitement and preparing for a big announcement.
Noel announces her new original song "Happi" composed by DECO*27 and mentions her birthday goods.
Noel leaves the stage for a costume change.
Noel performs her new original song 'Happi'.

subtitles.original: 思ってたんです！
subtitles.english: I was thinking!

subtitles.original: そう！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、ノエル嬉しい！ホントめちゃめちゃ良かった！
subtitles.english: Thank you, Noel, I'm so happy! It was really, really good!

subtitles.original: 嬉しい！ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: I'm so happy! Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Are you okay?

subtitles.original: なんかダンスしてるときよりも心拍数が...
subtitles.english: Somehow, more than when I was dancing, my heart rate is...

subtitles.original: 高い！いい、今ね、いいよ。
subtitles.english: High! It's good, right now, it's good.

subtitles.original: なんでだよ！なんでだよ！おかしいだろ！
subtitles.english: Why?! Why?! That's weird!

subtitles.original: ダンスの時の方がやばいだろ、絶対に。
subtitles.english: It must be worse when you're dancing, for sure.

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、これからもね、良かったね、仲良くしてね。
subtitles.english: Well, from now on too, I'm glad we could do this, let's keep being good friends.

subtitles.original: お誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy Birthday!

subtitles.original: イェーイ！イェーイ！ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Yay! Yay! Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: スバル先輩、写真撮りますか？
subtitles.english: Subaru-senpai, shall we take a photo?

subtitles.original: あ、撮るか！撮る。何にする？
subtitles.english: Oh, shall we! Let's take one. What pose?

subtitles.original: 団長はやっぱ、スバル先輩と今日、歌って踊って...
subtitles.english: I really wanted to, with Subaru-senpai today, sing and dance...

subtitles.original: 歌って踊って...
subtitles.english: Sing and dance...

subtitles.original: ちょっと好きな振り付けがあって。やっぱ、あれなんですよ、ここ！
subtitles.english: There's a choreography I like. It's that one, here!

subtitles.original: あ、これね！これ！
subtitles.english: Oh, this one! This!

subtitles.original: 好きだから。あ、ほら、みんな、団長歌って。
subtitles.english: Because I like it. Oh, look, everyone, sing with me.

subtitles.original: ほら、一緒に、歌って踊ったんだ。
subtitles.english: Look, we sang and danced together.

subtitles.original: ノエル、おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Noel, congratulations!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: なんか距離が空いてたらあれじゃん。
subtitles.english: If there's distance between us, it's a bit...

subtitles.original: そうだね。
subtitles.english: You're right.

subtitles.original: いや、ハッピーです。今日あれ、ハッピーライブなんで。
subtitles.english: No, I'm happy. Because today is the Happy Live.

subtitles.original: そうだね、ハッピーって書いてあるからね。
subtitles.english: That's true, it says "Happy" on it.

subtitles.original: いや、まだまだ実は、ハッピーなことがあってですね。
subtitles.english: Actually, there are still more happy things to come.

subtitles.original: そうなの？
subtitles.english: Really?

subtitles.original: そうなんです。ちょっと団長もその準備があるので、一緒に行きますか？
subtitles.english: Yes. I also have some preparations to do, so shall we go together?

subtitles.original: あ、一緒に。ハッピーしに行こう！
subtitles.english: Oh, together. Let's go be happy!

subtitles.original: 一緒に！
subtitles.english: Together!

subtitles.original: 楽しかったー！いや、めちゃめちゃハッピーなライブだったんじゃないでしょうか。
subtitles.english: That was fun! Well, wasn't that a super happy live performance?

subtitles.original: いや、最後、いや最後マジで心臓が止まるかと思ったんですけど。
subtitles.english: Wow, the end, at the end I really thought my heart was going to stop.

subtitles.original: いや、完全にね、団長得なライブでしたけど。
subtitles.english: Well, it was a live performance that was entirely to my benefit, but...

subtitles.original: いや、これはね、団長が誕生日だからハッピーに過ごそうっていうね、だけじゃないんです！
subtitles.english: Well, this isn't just about me having a happy birthday!

subtitles.original: えー、ちょっと画面のみんなびっくりしてると思うんですけど。ホントね、なんでハッピーだったか、ちょっと今、言います！
subtitles.english: Uh, I think everyone watching is surprised. Really, I'm going to tell you why it was so happy right now!

subtitles.original: ドゥルドゥルドゥルドゥル... ドン！なんとこの後、団長、オリ曲出します！イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Drumroll... Bam! Believe it or not, after this, I'm releasing an original song! Yay!

subtitles.original: そしてお披露目もしちゃいます！ということでね、あの、そのオリ曲のタイトルが「はっぴー」ということで、ひらがなでね、「はっぴー」なんですよ。
subtitles.english: And I'll even be performing it for the first time! So, the title of that original song is "Happi", written in hiragana as "はっぴー".

subtitles.original: で、しかもその曲を作ってくださった方が、あの有名なDECO*27さんということでね、団長もとうとうDECO*27さんに作ってもらえるようになりました。
subtitles.english: And what's more, the person who created this song is the famous DECO*27-san, so I've finally had a song made for me by DECO*27-san.

subtitles.original: それはね、皆さんの日々の応援のおかげです。ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: That's all thanks to everyone's daily support. Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: ということで、一応、お披露目した後に、あの24時から、あのリリースもされますので、そちらもよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: So, after the first performance, it will be released at midnight, so please look forward to that as well.

subtitles.original: あとね、あの定番なんですが、生誕グッズも発売いたします。それはね、オリ曲の後に発表しますので、何卒よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Also, as is standard, birthday goods will also go on sale. I'll announce those after the original song, so please stay tuned for that.

subtitles.original: いやー、どんなグッズなんだろうなー、ドンが来るのかな？いやー楽しみなんですけど、最後まで見ててくれると嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: Man, I wonder what kind of goods they are... maybe Don will show up? I'm looking forward to it, and I'd be happy if you watched until the end.

subtitles.original: そんな、あ、ちなみに生誕グッズはね数量限定なので、はい、あの欲しい人は、あの直筆、あ、生誕グッズ、数量限定じゃない、あ、あ...
subtitles.english: By the way, the birthday goods are limited in quantity, so, yes, for those who want them, the handwritten... oh, the birthday goods themselves aren't limited in quantity, ah, uh...

subtitles.original: あの数量限定じゃないよ。直筆が数量限定なので、何卒直筆サインが欲しい人は、あの張り付いてね、頑張ってください。
subtitles.english: They aren't limited in quantity. It's the handwritten signatures that are limited, so those who really want a handwritten signature, please stay glued to your screens and do your best.

subtitles.original: そしてね、メンバー限定に、あのグリーンバック素材とかもあります。このね、アイドル衣装だったりとかのグリーンバック素材もあるので。
subtitles.english: And also, for members only, there will be green screen assets and such. There will be green screen assets of this idol outfit and more.

subtitles.original: そちらも要チェック、メンバーさんよろしくね。ということで、あ、時間ない、着替えてきます！
subtitles.english: Make sure to check those out too, members. So, oh, I'm out of time, I'm going to change clothes!

subtitles.original: オヨヨヨヨヨヨヤ！
subtitles.english: Oyoyoyoyoyoyoya!

subtitles.original: もうハイになっちゃうよね オッケー
subtitles.english: I'm already getting high, right? Okay!

subtitles.original: 受け取っておね オッケー
subtitles.english: Please receive it, okay!

subtitles.original: きみのことがだも（ん）好きだもん
subtitles.english: Because I love you.

subtitles.original: きみのことがだもん / 好き
subtitles.english: Because I love you.

subtitles.original: はっぴー
subtitles.english: Happi

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：DECO*27 編曲：Rockwell
subtitles.english: Lyrics/Composition: DECO*27, Arrangement: Rockwell

subtitles.original: いい感じって
subtitles.english: "Feeling good," you say,

subtitles.original: 勘違いしちゃって
subtitles.english: But I misunderstood it,

subtitles.original: 恥ずかしくなっちゃうじゃん
subtitles.english: And now I'm getting embarrassed,

subtitles.original: ばかばか
subtitles.english: Stupid, stupid!

subtitles.original: あ待ってそれ以上わたしに近付かないで
subtitles.english: Oh, wait, don't come any closer to me than that!

subtitles.original: コーションコーション
subtitles.english: Caution, caution!

subtitles.original: 押し込んだ感情が 脱走脱走
subtitles.english: The emotions I've pushed down are escaping, escaping!

subtitles.original: 脱走
subtitles.english: Escape

subtitles.original: 想いのドミノ 倒してみて
subtitles.english: Try knocking over the dominoes of my feelings,

subtitles.original: 止まらなくて困るかも
subtitles.english: They might not stop, and that could be trouble.

subtitles.original: 言いたいこと全部言えちゃう魔法
subtitles.english: A magic spell that lets me say everything I want to say,

subtitles.original: とろけちゃうぐらいの鼓動を
subtitles.english: A heartbeat so strong it makes me melt,

subtitles.original: たっぷりかけて
subtitles.english: Pour it on thick!

subtitles.original: それで はっぴーじゃん きみが笑うなら
subtitles.english: Then it's happy, right? If you're laughing,

subtitles.original: それが はっぴーじゃん 心スキップして
subtitles.english: That's what's happy! My heart's skipping a beat,

subtitles.original: ジャンプして
subtitles.english: Jumping around,

subtitles.original: 落ち込んでだめだめだって
subtitles.english: Even when I'm feeling down and useless,

subtitles.original: 一回のきみの笑顔で
subtitles.english: With just one look at your smile,

subtitles.original: 全部忘れちゃうから
subtitles.english: I'll forget it all!

subtitles.original: もう何をやったってはいオッケー
subtitles.english: No matter what I do, yeah, okay!

subtitles.original: 謝ったらはいオッケー
subtitles.english: If I apologize, yeah, okay!

subtitles.original: 甘え過ぎたらめってしといてね
subtitles.english: If I get too clingy, please tell me "no," okay?

subtitles.original: もうハイになっちゃうよね オッケー
subtitles.english: I'm already getting high, right? Okay!

subtitles.original: 受け取っておね オッケー
subtitles.english: Please receive it, okay!

subtitles.original: きみのことがだも（ん）好きだもん
subtitles.english: Because I love you.

subtitles.original: きみのことがだもん / 好き
subtitles.english: Because I love you.
